name: Fish man avoiding fishing
description:
This is a simple casual game

The player plays a fisher
Dodge the flying harpoon
Hit by the harpoon, the game will end

After the game starts, the harpoon will fly from top to bottom. Or fly from the bottom up.
The harpoon has a fast fly and a slow fly.
You need to use the mouse to control the movement of the fisherman to avoid these harpoons.

The top of the screen shows how much time you have stuck

Operation method

Use the mouse to move to control the fisher
